**Cognitive scientist trained in psycholinguistics and cognitive neuroscience.**

I study how the brain and mind process speech, sound, and language, with a focus on multilingualism, executive control, hearing loss, misophonia, and developmental disorders such as autism.\

I am a Research Scientist at the Nepal Center for Cognition and Society ([NCCS](https://nccsnepal.org/)). My work includes cross-cultural cognition research in low-resource settings in Nepal.
I also serve as Adjunct Faculty at the National Academy of Medical Sciences in Kathmandu.
